Package com.andreasmenzel.adds_dji.OperationModes

Class OperationMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andreasmenzel.adds_dji.OperationModes.OperationMode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CancelLanding, CancelTakeOff, Hovering, Landing, None, OnGround, StartVirtualStick, StopVirtualStick, TakeOff, TurnOffMotors, TurnOnMotors, UseVirtualStick, WaypointMissionActive, WaypointMissionPause, WaypointMissionReady, WaypointMissionResume, WaypointMissionStart, WaypointMissionStop, WaypointMissionUpload
    public abstract class OperationMode
extends java.lang.Object
    The OperationMode describes the "low-level" action the drone is currently performing. This can be compared to DJIs Flight Modes (e.g. "GPS", "AUTO_TAKEOFF", ...). The Operation Modes are higher level than the DJI Flight Modes, however.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  OperationMode.States
      The possible states the Operation Mode can be in.

      • attemptFailed

        public void attemptFailed()

      • perform

        public void perform​(@NonNull
                    org.greenrobot.eventbus.EventBus bus)
        This function is called in the control loop of the DJIManager. This function is overwritten in every Operation Mode and performs the appropriate action.
        Parameters:
        bus - The event bus used to send events.
